description: The Large Magellanic Cloud is a nearby dwarf galaxy glowing with star birth. Just 160,000 light-years away, it hosts vast nebulae like the Tarantula and historic events such as Supernova 1987A, offering astronomers a rare, close-up laboratory to study how stars form, evolve, and explode.
title: Astronomers Look to the Large Magellanic Cloud to Study How Stars Are Born

description: The Telugu drama thriller Drive, directed by Jenuse Mohamed and starring Aadhi Pinisetty and Madonna Sebastian, is now streaming on Amazon Prime Video. The dark suspense story follows a media tycoon forced into a deadly high-stakes game by mysterious hackers.
title: Drive Telugu Thriller Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video

description: Streaming now on ZEE5, Naanu Matthu Gunda 2 is an emotional Kannada sequel about loyalty and reincarnation. Directed by Raghu Hassan, the film holds a strong IMDb rating of 8.8/10.
title: Naanu Matthu Gunda 2 Now Streaming on ZEE5: A Story of Loyalty, Love, and Reunion

description: Astronomers using NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory have discovered SPT-CL J2215-3537, a massive galaxy cluster located 8.4 billion light-years away. Nicknamed the “Champagne Supernova” cluster, it is the most distant relaxed cluster ever observed, showing no signs of recent collisions. Its calm structure and active star formation challenge existing theories about how quickly large-scale cosmic structures formed in the early universe.
title: NASA Finds Most Distant Calm Galaxy Cluster Ever Seen in Early Universe

description: Punjabi film Mehar marks Raj Kundra’s debut in Punjabi cinema and is now available on KableOne. The movie tells the heartfelt story of a man’s journey to reclaim his dignity and restore harmony in his family.
title: Raj Kundra’s Punjabi Film Mehar Now Streaming Online on KableOne

description: Skywatchers will be treated to a striking celestial event on January 3, 2026, as the Wolf Moon rises as a supermoon near Earth’s perihelion. Appearing larger and brighter than usual, the full Moon will climb the eastern sky at dusk, accompanied by the brilliant planet Jupiter. This rare alignment—last seen more than a century ago—offers a vivid start to the year and a reminder of the dynamic motions of the Earth–Moon–Sun system.
title: Wolf Moon Supermoon 2026: Rare January Full Moon Near Perihelion Lights Up the Sky

description: Honor Power 2 will launch next week in China.  The company has now teased the colour options and the AnTuTu benchmark score of the phone. It is confirmed to be the first phone to come with the MediaTek Dimensity 8500 Elite chipset. It will feature a 10,080mAh battery. The Honor Power 2 will debut as a successor to the original Honor Power.
title: Honor Power 2 AnTuTu Benchmark Score, Colourways Teased Ahead of January 5 China Launch

description: Instagram Head Adam Mosseri believes that the rise of artificial intelligence (AI)-generated images and videos is forcing the platform to evolve quickly. The Meta-owned social media platform gained popularity for its image and video-centric feed, and is a major driver of the creator economy, which is run by influencers and content creators. However, the executive thinks that AI-generated content is improving so fast that soon it might become impossible to distinguish it from camera-captured content.
title: Instagram Will Have to Evolve Fast, Warns Adam Mosseri Amid Rise of AI Content

description: The Realme 16 Pro series will launch in India in early January 2026, featuring the Realme 16 Pro 5G and Realme 16 Pro+ 5G, alongside the Realme Pad 3 5G. The phones will offer AMOLED displays, a 200-megapixel main camera, Android 16-based Realme UI 7.0, and a 7,000mAh battery. The Pro+ model will use a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, while the Pro variant will feature a MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Max SoC.
title: Realme 16 Pro Series Roundup: Know About the Expected Price in India, Launch Timeline and Specifications

description: Managing everyday digital payments with Airtel Payments Bank
title: Safe Second Account: A Simple Digital Banking Habit to Start in 2026

description: Apple reportedly cut production of its Vision Pro headset due to disappointing sales. The company has reportedly slashed digital ad spending for the headset by over 95 percent in markets including the US and UK. High price tag, bulky design, and lack of visionOS native apps are likely to be the key reasons behind the poor sales performance of the Apple Vision Pro headset. The company is said to be working on a more affordable version of the Vision Pro.
title: Apple Vision Pro Production, Marketing Said to be Scaled Back Due to Low Sales

description: Perplexity’s Aravind Srinivas said AI packed into local device chips that handle inference could pose the biggest threat to traditional data centres, signalling a shift from server-centric processing. He also discussed autonomous AI agents, the role of browsers in AI infrastructure, and the contrast between human curiosity and artificial systems’ limitations.
title: Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas Says On-Device AI Can Disrupt the Data Centre Industry

description: Redmi Note 15 5G and Redmi Note 15 5G 108 Master Pixel Edition are confirmed to launch in India on January 6. The new lineup will go on sale through Amazon in the country. Here is all you need to know about the launch, expected price, specifications, and features of Redmi Note 15 5G and Redmi Note 15 5G 108 Master Pixel Edition.
title: Redmi Note 15 5G Series Roundup: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features

description: Europe’s banking sector may reduce more than 200,000 jobs by 2030 as lenders adopt AI technologies and move services online, analysts say. The Morgan Stanley analysis reported by the Financial Times projects that roughly 10 per cent of roles at major banks could be lost, particularly in internal operations, with some institutions already announcing workforce reductions.
title: AI Can Reportedly Take Away More Than 2 Lakh Banking Jobs by 2030

description: The Poco M8 5G is all set to be launched in India soon as the successor to the Poco M7 5G. It is expected to be the first model in the latest M-series lineup and could be joined by a Pro model. In recent weeks, the Xiaomi subsidiary has been revealing details about the handset ahead of its anticipated debut. It is confirmed to sport a 6.77-inch 3D curved display and feature the Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chipset under the hood.
title: Poco M8 5G: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features and More

description: Astronomers have found that the young star V1180 Cassiopeiae shows a rare mix of accretion-driven brightening and dust-caused dimming. Based on nearly 25 years of observations, the study explains its long-standing variability and shows how early stellar growth is shaped by tightly linked accretion, extinction, and outflow processes.
title: Astronomers Decode the Strange Behaviour of a Young Star 1,950 Light-Years Away

description: The Poco M8 5G is scheduled to be launched in India soon. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the Xiaomi subsidiary has confirmed several details about the upcoming handset, including its display, chipset, and software support. It will 6.77-inch 3D curved display. Powering the Poco M8 5G will be the Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 chipset. The handset is confirmed to run on HyperOS 2, with four years of promised Android updates.
title: Poco M8 5G Confirmed to Feature 3D Curved Display and Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 Chip; Software Policy Announced

description: Directed by Susanna Fogel, Ponies is an upcoming thriller web series that stars Emilia Clarke and Haley Lu Richardson in the lead roles. Streaming soon.
title: Ponies OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Emilia Clarke and Haley Lu Richardson Starrer Series Online?

description: Astronomers have identified dozens of runaway stars moving fast enough to escape the Milky Way. By tracking these hypervelocity stars, researchers can map the galaxy’s gravitational pull and better understand how dark matter is distributed across its vast halo, offering new insight into the unseen structure shaping our cosmic home.
title: Runaway Stars Help Astronomers Trace Dark Matter Distribution Across the Milky Way Galaxy

description: The Samsung Galaxy A57 5G has been spotted on India’s BIS certification database, indicating that it may launch in the country soon. The listing confirms the model number SM-A576B/DS with dual SIM support and points to an early 2026 debut. The phone is expected to feature an Exynos 1680 chipset, Android 16, up to 12GB RAM, a flexible AMOLED display, and a 50-megapixel main camera, positioning it as a premium mid-range offering.
title: Samsung Galaxy A57 5G Appears on BIS Website, Could Launch in India Soon

description: Samsung’s 2026 roadmap includes the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) into all of its devices. The statement was made by TM Roh, the Head of Mobile eXperience (MX) and Device eXperience (DX) Divisions, and President and co-CEO of Samsung Electronics, during the company’s new year address. Samsung Electronics Vice Chairman and the Head of Device Solution (DS) Division, Jeon Young-hyun, also delivered his address to the company.
title: Samsung Wants to Integrate AI Into All Devices, Says DX Division Head TM Roh

description: Directed by Razneesh Ghai, 120 Bahadur is an Indian historical war film that revolves around the battle against the Chinese troops to defend against the invasion. Now available for Rent.
title: 120 Bahadur Now Available for Rent Online: Know Where to Watch This Patriotic Film

description: Haq, inspired by Shah Bano Begum’s landmark legal battle, features Yami Gautam and Emraan Hashmi and is streaming on Netflix from January 2, 2025. The story involves the highlight of women rights to maintenance and it has chosen to be a landmark.
title: Haq Now Available for Streaming Online: Where to Watch Emraan Hashmi and Yami Gautam Starrer Online?

description: Motorola Signature is confirmed to launch in India next week. Now, a leaked marketing image of the phone suggests support for stylus input. The render shows the phone with a triple camera setup along with an LED flash. It is said to come with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, up to 16GB of RAM and a 6.7-inch OLED display.
title: Motorola Signature Spotted in Leaked Marketing Image That Hints at Stylus Support

description: Physical: Welcome To Mongolia is a Korean reality show that is currently streaming on Netflix. The show will revolve around the Korean Team from Physical Asia, now exploring Mongolia under the guidance of Bayarsaikhan.
title: Physical: Welcome To Mongolia Streaming Now on Netflix: Know Everything About This Korean Reality Show

description: Samsung on Friday unveiled Freestyle+, its newest portable projector designed to bring smarter and flexible entertainment across a wide range of spaces. As per the South Korean tech conglomerate, it will be showcased at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 in Las Vegas, which begins next week. The updated Freestyle+ builds on the design of the original model, while introducing a suite of artificial intelligence (AI)-backed picture optimisation features.
title: Samsung Unveils Freestyle+ Ahead of CES 2026, Touts AI-Powered Screen Optimisation Features

description: LG Electronics will unveil its 2026 LG Gram laptop lineup at CES 2026, focusing on lighter designs, a new Aerominum chassis, and expanded AI features. The laptops support on-device and cloud-based AI, including Microsoft Copilot+ PC tools, along with improved connectivity and security features. The lineup includes the Gram Pro 17 with an RTX 5050 GPU and the Gram Pro 16 with an OLED display and Intel Core Ultra processors. Pricing and availability details remain undisclosed.
title: CES 2026: LG Gram Laptops With New 'Aerominum' Finish, On-Device AI Capabilities Unveiled

description: DeepSeek’s latest paper introduces Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections (mHC), a method designed to make large AI model training more stable and efficient by constraining residual signal flow. The architecture was tested on models up to 27 billion parameters and showed improved training stability without excessive overhead. Research focuses on reducing costly training failures rather than hardware power changes.
title: DeepSeek’s New Architecture Can Make AI Model Training More Efficient and Reliable

description: Dell may be preparing to revive its XPS branding, according to a new report, just a year after retiring the name in favour of the Dell, Dell Pro, and Dell Pro Max lineup. Sources claim Dell has already showcased an updated XPS lineup during CES 2026 pre-briefings, with an announcement possible next week. While Dell has not confirmed the move, the potential comeback signals a shift from its Premium-tier strategy introduced at CES 2025.
title: Dell XPS Laptop Branding to Make a Comeback, New Models Expected to Launch at CES 2026: Report

description: OpenAI is reportedly increasing its focus on the company's audio-based artificial intelligence (AI) models. As per the report, the San Francisco-based AI giant has combined several teams, including engineering, product, and research, to develop a new audio generation model. This model is said to power the company’s audio-first AI device, which could be launched later in 2026.
title: OpenAI Reportedly Steps Up Audio AI Work as It Gears Up for Its Upcoming Audio Device

description: Oppo has announced that it will launch the Reno 15 series in India on January 8. The lineup includes the Oppo Reno 15 Pro 5G and Oppo Reno 15 Pro Mini 5G. Both smartphones will feature a 200-megapixel main camera and introduce Oppo’s PureTone Technology, which is said to balance subject and background tones in photos.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series India Launch Date Announced: Expected Specifications, Features

description: A return to proprietary processor components is said to be on the cards for Samsung, which could mark a shift in its mobile chip strategy. According to a tipster’s claims on social media, the South Korean tech conglomerate is exploring a return to custom CPU and GPU architectures with the purported Exynos 2800 processor. If this move materialises, it would signal a shift from its recent approach of using standard ARM CPU cores and GPUs sourced from chipmakers in its flagship Exynos chipsets.
title: Samsung’s Exynos 2800 Chip Could Mark a Return to Proprietary CPU and GPU Designs, Tipster Claim

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra could arrive with a new display privacy feature, and information about a new "Privacy Display" feature was reportedly found in the One UI 8.5 firmware's Tips app. It is said to reduce screen visibility from side angles and enhance privacy. The feature dims or makes the screen darker when viewed from the side, making it difficult for others nearby to read what's on the display.
title: Samsung's One UI 8.5 Beta Reportedly Reveals How Galaxy S26 Ultra's Private Display Feature Works

description: Motorola’s upcoming Moto X70 Air Pro has appeared on the TENAA certification database, revealing its full specifications ahead of launch. The listing suggests a 6.78-inch 1.5K OLED display, a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, up to 16GB RAM and 1TB onboard storage, and triple 50-megapixel rear cameras with a 3x periscope lens. It may pack a 5,100mAh battery with 90W fast charging, run Android 16, and feature a slim, lightweight design.
title: Moto X70 Air Pro Key Specifications Revealed via TENAA Listing Ahead of China Launch

description: OnePlus appears to be gearing up to release the OnePlus Nord 6 as a successor to the OnePlus Nord 5. While launch details are yet to be revealed formally, the handset has been spotted on the Telecommunications and Digital Government Regulatory Authority (TDRA) website. The listing indicates that a launch could be imminent.
title: OnePlus Nord 6 Appearance on TDRA Certification Website Hints at Upcoming Launch

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) announced the nationwide rollout of the Voice over Wi-Fi (VoWiFi) service on Thursday, for all telecom circles in India. With this move, the state-owned telecom service provider (TSP) has caught up with private players like Airtel and Jio, which have long offered access to VoWiFi. This technology allows subscribers to make and receive voice calls and messages over Wi-Fi, delivering enhanced connectivity in challenging environments.
title: BSNL Launches Wi-Fi Calling Service Across All Circles in India for Improved Connectivity

description: Samsung is expected to unveil several smartphones in 2026, headlined by the flagship Galaxy S26 series and the Galaxy Z Fold 8 and Galaxy Z Flip 8. Details, including key specifications and launch date, of the aforementioned handsets have now surfaced ahead of their anticipated debut. According to a report, the Galaxy S26 series will not receive a price hike, amid rising prices of its competitors due ot  the RAM shortage.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26, Galaxy Z Fold 8 to Reportedly Evade Price Hike Amid RAM Shortage; Launch Date Tipped
